description:
We finally have Darling gracing the pages of our site, and this has been a long time coming. I have wanted to get her in my ropes for a long time, and the day is finally here. This was our February live shoot, and Darling was more than willing to take what I was going to dish out.
She begins with her huge tits bound tightly and her neck tied secured by rope as well. Her arms are box tied behind her, she is pulled up to her tip toes, leaving her completely helpless. The scene begins, and it doesn't take long before I turn this standing tie into an intense suspension.
Next, Darling is on her back with her arms and legs pulled in opposite directions, making her back arch beautifully. She it tormented with floggers, and then electricity. A nasty crotch rope is added to put the final bit of stress on her body to push her to her breaking point.
The finale, is when Darling is tied in a flying hogtie, which is one of the most difficult bondage positions. Her feet are mercilessly beaten, and we find that Darling has two orgasms from the pain.
title: Devastating Darling
